channel.title: [Will anybody please help with 2 things?] -Purez4life
channel.description:
[u]First... I've downloaded the "R00nscape Client" and the "377 Cache(or which ever)... And when [b]*I*[/b] try to log into the Client... It says "Error Connecting To Server."[/u] [shadow=red,left]Anyone know the PROBLEM?[/shadow]
Second of the post... I need a little help for changing [b]starting-off Coordinates[/b] and the [b]starting off player look[/b]. May seem easy to anybody who knows these, but [b]*I*[/b] am clueless.
[u]Thanks for helping/reading my post! ~Purez4life~[/u]

item.title: [Will anybody please help with 2 things?] -Purez4life
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

Goneby123:

2. goto client.java and serach youdied() and change coods

Actually thats only for the respawn point after they die. If you want to change where the players are when they first log on go to player.java and search for

// initial x and y coordinates of the player

Read full topic

item.title: [Will anybody please help with 2 things?] -Purez4life
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

  1. what are you trying to connect to??

  2. goto client.java and serach youdied() and change coods

  3. for player looks serach in player.java

//Giving the player an unique look playerEquipment[playerHat]=-1; playerEquipment[playerCape]=-1; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=-1; playerEquipment[playerChest]=-1; playerEquipment[playerShield]=-1; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=-1; playerEquipment[playerHands]=-1; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=-1; playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=1323;

and change the -1 to what ever item u want them to wear and if u dont want them to have anything on in tht sopt leave it as -1

Read full topic

item.title: [Will anybody please help with 2 things?] -Purez4life
item.dc:creator: @purez4life purez4life
item.description:
@purez4life wrote:

First… I’ve downloaded the “R00nscape Client” and the "377 Cache(or which ever)… And when I try to log into the Client… It says “Error Connecting To Server.” [shadow=red,left]Anyone know the PROBLEM?[/shadow]

Second of the post… I need a little help for changing starting-off Coordinates and the starting off player look. May seem easy to anybody who knows these, but I am clueless.

Thanks for helping/reading my post! ~Purez4life~
